      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Transformacija energije pri nihalu</string>
            <string language="en">Energy transformation related to pendulum motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation in Verbindung gestanden auf
Pendelbewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation d'énergie liée au mouvement de 
pendule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia relacionada ao 
movimento do pêndulo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia relativa a movimento 
del pendolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακός μετασχηματισμός σχετικός με την κίνηση 
εκκρεμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía relacionada con el
movimiento del péndulo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Potencialna in kinetična energija kot funkciji časa pri ravninskem nihalu.</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of energy in case of planar pendulum,  oscillation of kinetic and potencial energy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potencialna energija</string>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation von Energie falls vom planaren 
Pendel, Pendelbewegung der kinetischen und potencial Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation de l'énergie en cas de pendule 
planaire, oscillation d'énergie cinétique et potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia caso que do pêndulo 
planar, oscilação da energia cinética e potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia nel caso del pendolo 
planare, oscillazione di energia cinetica e potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός της ενέργειας σε περίπτωση επίπεδου 
εκκρεμούς, ταλάντωση της κινητικής και potencial ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía en caso de que del
péndulo planar, oscilación de la energía cinética y potencial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Energie</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
